vpsisssimcopDmaCtrlParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » LDC Config API

SIMCOP DMA Control parameters. Typically set once and will not be changed. More...

#include <vps_cfgsimcop.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t bwLimit
 
uint32_t tagCnt
 
uint32_t enablePostedWrite
 
vpsisssimcopDmaMaxBustSize_t maxBurstSize
 

Detailed Description

SIMCOP DMA Control parameters. Typically set once and will not be changed.

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsisssimcopDmaCtrlParams::bwLimit

Used to set number of functional clock cycles between two OCP requests. This parameter could be used to reduce traffic generated by the SIMCOP DMA for non real time critical applications. 0: provides maximum performance.

uint32_t vpsisssimcopDmaCtrlParams::enablePostedWrite

Select write type 0: Only nonposted writes are generated 1: Only posted writes are generated

vpsisssimcopDmaMaxBustSize_t vpsisssimcopDmaCtrlParams::maxBurstSize

Defines the maximum burst length

uint32_t vpsisssimcopDmaCtrlParams::tagCnt

Limits the outstanding transactions count. Only tags 0 to tagCnt will be used by SIMCOP DMA. Max value is 0xF
